title: We love: fashion fixes for the week ahead – in pictures
description: Get Kate Moss’s iconic style at Zara, meet Wilson the Whale, the sea-loving star of the latest Shelter collection, and a sweater featuring embroidered snails Continue reading...
author: Jo Jones, Helen Seamons and Sam Deaman
excerpt: Get Kate Moss’s iconic style at Zara, meet Wilson the Whale, the sea-loving star of the latest Shelter collection, and a sweater featuring embroidered snails
text: Making wavesFatFace introduces Wilson the Whale, the sea-loving star of the latest Shelter collection. This Christmas celebrates five years of FatFace’s partnership with the housing and homelessness charity, with 10% of sales from the collection going direct to Shelter and their crucial work.This Giving Tuesday, 3 December, FatFace will be doubling donations to mark the partnership milestone, helping to support Shelter’s life-changing cause. Left to right: wave jumper, £56, jacquard bottoms, £34.50, wave jumper, £55, whale jacquard PJ’s, £39.50, fatface.com
html:
Making waves

FatFace introduces Wilson the Whale, the sea-loving star of the latest Shelter collection. This Christmas celebrates five years of FatFace’s partnership with the housing and homelessness charity, with 10% of sales from the collection going direct to Shelter and their crucial work.This Giving Tuesday, 3 December, FatFace will be doubling donations to mark the partnership milestone, helping to support Shelter’s life-changing cause. Left to right: wave jumper, £56, jacquard bottoms, £34.50, wave jumper, £55, whale jacquard PJ’s, £39.50, fatface.com
